pages.text: Counter with Doliums are kitchen facilities. Alike others, they have variants of different $(l:intro/kitchen_materials)kitchen materials$(/l).
Counter with Dolium can store fluid or resting them, its material doesn't matters.
Counter with Dolium have three input slots and an output slot in GUI.
As for storing fluid, only its fluid tank is useful. Its liquid could be drain or fill just as the stew pot do. Spice can also apply when draining soups.
Three inputs are for the resting recipes: just put all materials inside and leave them alone for a long time and they would become something new, refer to the resting category for details.
